mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT point_idx, cate_idx, user_idx, point_info, point_usedate, point_num, point_use, CASE WHEN point_use = 0 THEN point_num ELSE point_num END AS point_changed, SUM(CASE WHEN point_use = 0 THEN point_num ELSE -point_num END) OVER (PARTITION BY user_idx ORDER BY point_usedate) AS point_sum, CASE WHEN point_use = 0 THEN '적립' ELSE '사용' END AS point_type, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY point_usedate DESC) AS rnum2, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY point_usedate ASC) AS rnum FROM point WHERE user_idx = #{user_idx} and point_num !=0 ) a WHERE rnum2 BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY rnum DESC
select count(*) from point where user_idx =#{user_idx} and point_num !=0
